poem:
### Fission Dreams  

In the concrete bones  
of tomorrow's promise—  
£14.2bn blooms  
like unseen sunflowers,  
while in government halls  
whispers grow heavy  
with charged potential;  
star fire, restless,  
held by trembling hands,  
illuminates the corners  
where questions drift—  
quiet as particles,  
anchored to silence  
yet spiraling in dreams  
of unbroken energy.
